enhancements.name: Hunter's Mark
enhancements.description: Move target one step down condition track
enhancements.trigger: After aiming, if attack deals damage
enhancements.notes: Target must take damage from the attack after aiming

enhancements.name: Debilitating Shot
enhancements.description: Move target one step down condition track
enhancements.trigger: After aiming, if attack deals damage
enhancements.notes: Target must take damage from the attack after aiming

enhancements.name: Knockdown Shot
enhancements.notes: Target must be no larger than two size categories bigger than you

enhancements.name: Precision Fire
enhancements.notes: Makes it harder for Force users to deflect your attack

enhancements.name: Stunning Strike
enhancements.description: Move target one step down condition track
enhancements.trigger: When you deal damage with melee attack and exceed damage threshold
enhancements.notes: Only applies if damage exceeds target's damage threshold

enhancements.name: Dastardly Attack
enhancements.description: Move target one step down condition track
enhancements.trigger: Attack against opponent denied Dexterity to Defense
enhancements.notes: Target must be denied Dex bonus to Reflex Defense

enhancements.name: Weakening Strike
enhancements.description: Impose -5 to attack and melee damage instead of condition track
enhancements.trigger: When you deal damage to opponent denied Dex to Defense
enhancements.notes: Alternative to moving down condition track; player choice

enhancements.name: Keep Them at Bay
enhancements.trigger: When you aid another to suppress an attack
